answers.answer: Hi there, symptoms have been tough, I've had nausea, loss of appetite, fatigue and headaches since 6.5 weeks and I am now 12.5 weeks. I've also caught a gastro bug(would you believe?!) this week which has meant I've added dihorrea and vomiting to the mix. I usually run regularly and have tried to keep it up where possible but sometimes I've just needed to rest. Apart from that I've been really excited to see our new little person on the ultrasound last week! That makes it all worthwhile :-)
I'm also a first time mum too :-)
Awwwh poor you, hope you can hold yourself together, not long for 2nd trimester, it should ease down for you.
Hi I'm 14wks+4 I'm very excited about becoming a mother again I have a 14yr old first trimester was a little hard but feel much better now having a girl had no sickness with first baby boy
Have been doing fine but seems like I'm always hungry I'm 7 wks  and I sleep thru out the day

I'm a Lil over 36 weeks this pregnancy has been a dousy. I had morning sickness for the first several months, I have an incompetent cervix, gestational diabetes, high blood pressure and I've had labor stopped 3 times at 33 weeks. Now we're far enough along we are just waiting.  Pregnancy is hard for me this is my second,  I consider pregnancy beautiful torture lol I'm so thankful for my babies but it's not easy for me so we don't plan on any more.

question: Hi everyone just thought illshare my pregnancy and so everyone can have a chance to tell everyone how they copping. According to my calculations I'm 8 weeks pregnant and so far I've hadto sickness, fatigue or nausea, just some strong flutters which I find normalish. And I gotta say Im enjoying my pregnancy, I'm still going gym keep my daily activities strong always full of energy. So what are you mommy's feeling?
title: Who's enjoying there pregnancy ladies?
